channel.title: Ethernet Over DS3 on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Ethernet Over DS3 on 0x000216

item.title: Ethernet over DS3 Advantage
item.description: Ethernet over Copper and Ethernet over Fiber are becoming increasingly popular choices for WAN connections. This popularity is driven by competitive pricing and the availability of services like layer 2 switching with direct Ethernet connections. So why would you consider Ethernet over DS3? It may seem like an unusual combination. DS3, a widely available telecom service, provides 45 Mbps using TDM (Time Division Multiplexing) technology from the T-Carrier standard. Organizations typically use DS3 for dedicated point-to-point connections, high-bandwidth internet access, and high-volume phone lines in contact and call centers.
